front.title: Traversal Using Relay NAT (TURN) Extension for IPv4/IPv6 transition

abstract.t: This document defines the Traversal Using Relay NAT (TURN) REQUESTED- ADDRESS-TYPE attribute, which allows a client to explicitly request the address type the TURN server will allocate (e.g., an IPv4-only node may request the TURN server to allocate an IPv6 address). This document also registers the IPv6 address type.
